ygData.subject: New songs
ygData.msgSnippet: So, has anyone tried out any of the new songs and figured out what they do yet? I purchased the level 30 song, but haven t had the chance to investigate yet.
ygData.messageBody:
So, has anyone tried out any of the new songs and figured out what they do
yet?

I purchased the level 30 song, but haven't had the chance to investigate
yet. The icon is a red-background Disenchant symbol, so my first guess on
that would be a targeted Disenchant to de-buff enemies (or maybe de-charm
friends?). If it can remove charm, it could be very handy against certain
creatures. (I just love getting beat up by my own party's Monk when
fighting the Diviner in Cazic...)

Oh, the song is in Freeport by the way. There are new songs in Kelethin,
Freeport, and Erudin. I haven't had the chance to check Qeynos or Highpass
yet.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
